overview: Snow is suspended. It becomes rare. The wonder is in peril.  The extraordinary atmosphere which it induces and which suspends the stifled daily life, moves away from our impatience.  Snow is a curtain behind which capitalist issues are going on, the consequences of which are universal and global.  Nivose is an attempt to reverse the movement, to fix and revive by abstraction a climatic phenomenon so far condemned by mankind in a process that could be inescapable. Magic operates when the camera catches the flakes in the opposite direction.
title: Nivose
